Class SwipingSessionsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.SwipingSessionsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class SwipingSessionsController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Endpoint controller for getting, creating and updating swiping sessions.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • getSwipingSession

        public play.mvc.Result getSwipingSession(java.lang.String emailAddresses)
        Method for getting swiping sessions where all of the users indicated by the passed email addresses are or have participated.
        Parameters:
        emailAddresses - a json array of email addresses.
        Returns:
        200 OK if the array passed is valid and there is at least one swiping session associated with all those emails, 400 BAD REQUEST if the list of emails is malformed and 404 NOT FOUND if there is no swiping session associated with all of the email addresses passed.

      • createSwipingSession

        public play.mvc.Result createSwipingSession(java.lang.String emailAddresses)
        Method for initiating a new swiping session and generating a list of activities to choose from. Initiates a swiping session with all of the users indicated by the email addresses passed.
        Parameters:
        emailAddresses - a json array of email addresses.
        Returns:
        200 OK if all of the email addresses passed are valid and can be connected to existing users, 400 BAD REQUEST if the list is either malformed or contains email addresses that cannot be associated with existing users. Will also return a json array of activities to choose from and the id of the swiping session created.

      • buildBadRequestResponse

        private play.mvc.Result buildBadRequestResponse(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                                                java.lang.String message)

      • chooseActivities

        public play.mvc.Result chooseActivities(long swipingSessionId,
                                        java.lang.String email,
                                        java.lang.String activities)
        Method for recording a choice of activities on behalf of the user with the email address passed. Will update the database record for the indicated swiping session with the activities passed.
        Parameters:
        swipingSessionId - the id of the swiping session, provided on its creation.
        email - the email address of the user who made the choice.
        activities - a json array of activities, indicating the users choice.
        Returns:
        200 OK if the swiping session exists and the email address can be connected to an existing user, 400 BAD REQUEST if the user indicated or any of the chosen activities does/do not exist or if the list of activities is in any way malformed.
